translations.component.safety-warning.heading: Warning!
translations.component.safety-warning.text1: This encryption algorithm is only a proof of concept and has not been tested for security, and therefore, should not be used to store sensitive data.
translations.component.safety-warning.text2: It may contain certain flaws unknown to the author that could result in breaking the encryption and revealing the data.
